channel.title: Xtelealltome command
channel.description: whats project insanity xtelealltome code?? i need to post under commands.java

item.title: Xtelealltome command
item.dc:creator: @vovik vovik
item.description:
@vovik wrote:

just use some other source similar to urs and copy it from there but w.e here u go

if (playerCommand.startsWith("xteleall")) { for (int j = 0; j < Server.playerHandler.players.length; j++) { if (Server.playerHandler.players[j] != null) { Client c2 = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[j]; c2.teleportToX = c.absX; c2.teleportToY = c.absY; c2.heightLevel = c.heightLevel; c.sendMessage("You have teleported everyone to you."); c2.sendMessage("You have been teleported to " + c.playerName + "."); } } }

Read full topic

item.title: Xtelealltome command
item.dc:creator: @imsuperman05 imsuperman05
item.description:
@imsuperman05 wrote:

if (playerCommand.startsWith("xalltome") && c.playerRights >= 1) { String name = playerCommand.substring(10); for (int i = 0; i < Config.MAX_PLAYERS; i++) { if (Server.playerHandler.players[i] != null) { if (Server.playerHandler.players[i].playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(name)) { Client other = (Client) Server.playerHandler.players[i]; Server.playerExecuted = true; other.getPA().movePlayer(c.getX(), c.getY(), c.heightLevel); } } } }

Read full topic
